SALESFORCE.ORG RELEASE NOTES
Nonprofit Cloud Release Notes

Nonprofit Cloud now harnesses the power of the Salesforce Platform. By building on the platform, Nonprofit Cloud provides faster, easier access to the full portfolio of innovative Salesforce products and services.

Within the Nonprofit Cloud sits Nonprofit Cloud for Programs. This collection of features includes versions of Program Management and Case Management, recreated to take advantage of everything the platform has to offer.

Also included are Salesforce tools, such as Life Events, Actionable Relationship Center, Accounting Subledger, and Timeline, that help streamline your business processes. Nonprofit Cloud uses a different way to record people and their relationships: Person Accounts and Party Relationship Groups. Person Accounts let you record people not just as contacts on an account, but as accounts themselves and Party Relationship Groups let you draw connections between individuals, between organizations, or between individuals and organizations. All these things combine to help you eliminate paperwork, streamline processes, and spend more time working with participants to meet your mission.

Where: This change applies to Lightning Experience in Enterprise and Unlimited editions.

Case Management for Nonprofit Cloud Release Notes
Create Dynamic Assessments for Account, Contact, and Case objects. Use guided flows to track attendance. Preview your Care Plan Template before you publish it and use the Care Plan Summary View to see everything in one place. Set up your referral flow using easily accessible components. Use the Merge UI flow to combine Party Relationship Groups and automatically update related records.
Program Management for Nonprofit Cloud Release Notes
Enable program managers to efficiently manage their programs by using action plans. Use field-level security to restrict users’ access to view and edit specific fields. Get a comprehensive and chronological view of your program and benefit activities. Modify the benefit schedule workflow as per your business needs.
Add Accounting Subledger to Nonprofit Cloud Release Notes
Introducing Accounting Subledger for Nonprofit Cloud! Consolidate data between Salesforce CRM and your accounting system to understand how and where funds are received, paid, and allocated, with unparalleled performance.
